task.name: slsearch

param.name: tablename
param.description: Input spectral line table name to search. If not specified, use the default table in the system.

param.name: outfile
param.description: Results table name. Blank means do not write the table to disk.

param.name: qns
param.description: Resolved quantum numbers to search for.

param.name: intensity
param.description: CDMS/JPL intensity range. -1 -> do not use an intensity range.

param.name: smu2
param.description: S*mu*mu range in Debye**2. -1 -> do not use an S*mu*mu range.

param.name: loga
param.description: log(A) (Einstein coefficient) range. -1 -> do not use a loga range.

param.name: eu
param.description: Upper energy state range in Kelvin. -1 -> do not use an eu range.

param.name: el
param.description: Lower energy state range in Kelvin. -1 -> do not use an el range.

param.name: rrlinclude
param.description: Include RRLs in the result set?

param.name: rrlonly
param.description: Include only RRLs in the result set?

param.name: verbose
param.description: List result set to logger (and optionally logfile)?

param.name: logfile
param.description: List result set to this logfile (only used if verbose=True).

param.name: append
param.description: If true, append to logfile if it already exists, if false overwrite logfile it it exists. Only used if verbose=True and logfile not blank.

param.name: wantreturn
param.description: If true, return the spectralline tool associated with the result set.
